title: Vi Skin Suggestions?
body: i just bought 500 dollars worth of ip and im planning on to buy just 1 skin for vi what skin should i get?

replies.body: Neon strike is best. I have all 3 of her skins but thats just because I looove Vi :v can't play her though cause pick/ban all the damn time
I like debonoir. Its a simpler skin, but it looks really nice to me.
500 dollars of rp? Nice I recommend officer Vi
